title: Infinite Leaverbusters because of Game Crashing
body:
Sometimes i go into a game, then crash. It returns me to the home page. Where it has the Play button. I cant click the Play button or anything. Then i restart LoL. Finds out, i have 5 matchmade leaverbusters because they remade. 

I CANT PLAY WITH INFINITE LEAVERBUSTERS EVERYTIME I GO INTO A GAME.

REALLY MAKING ME MAD.

replies.body: The only way to remove leaverbuster is by playing through your required games without leaving, so it's really important to fix this up.  To get a better idea of what's happening I'll need more info like what you exactly by crash.  What do you see exactly, and when is it happening?

After the champion select, The League closes. It soons reappears but not in the loading screen. It returns me to the home page. Except i cant press Play or anything. I cant do anything but close League and reopen. Everytime i reconnect, it takes so long and then i find out my team has remade. So i get a leaver. EVERY TIME

Do you receive a reconnect button at all?  If not then I suggest reaching out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) .  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and attach some logs to your ticket to help us get an idea of why this is happening.  We'll get back to you!
